page.title: 13Leisure and recreation.
page.content: There are numerous opportunities for recreation in our block - especially sailing and water sports on the marina and on the canal.Dinghy sailing is a popular pastime on the marina,whilst on the canal cruising is the main attraction. Canoeing is done on both marina and the canal,and organized cruises operate from the Glasson Dock quayside. Pupils from our school have canoeing lessons on the yacht basin in the summer, but they must always wear a lifejacket and have passed their bronze swimming award before they are allowed. There are two football pitches used by local amateur teams close by the school. These are used at weekends in the winter time.
